code: import _objectSpread from"/home/tanya/TS/REACT/Projects/online-clothing/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import{ShopActionTypes}from'./shop.types';var INITIAL_STATE={collections:null,isFetching:false,errorMessage:undefined};var shopReducer=function shopReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:INITIAL_STATE;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ShopActionTypes.FETCH_COLLECTIONS_START:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isFetching:true});case ShopActionTypes.FETCH_COLLECTIONS_SUCCESS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{collections:action.payload,isFetching:false});case ShopActionTypes.FETCH_COLLECTIONS_FAILURE:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isFetching:false,errorMessage:action.payload});default:return state;}};export default shopReducer;
